item.title: Re: HELP
item.content:encoded:
Like Moare said, you only need to get yourself Bingo'ed (someone bingo you, you fail a spying attack, you fail a raid or an invasion), and then complete the quest "Revenge". This will give you "Wasteland Disease" Bloodline.

If you currently have about 4-5 Notepages and the Jutsu "Epic Dog Urination Technique" (EDUT), you can complete the trade in about 1-2 days. This will give you "The Trade" Bloodline.

item.title: Re: HELP
item.content:encoded:
The easiest would be Wasteland Disease which only require you to be able to pass a 15diff 4succ gen check without allies or strenght modifiers and be bingo'd.
An other "easy" bloodline is The Trade, which require you to bingo at max 40 people (200 style points) + 1 village leader, and gather 5 apples dropped by hyuk (who you get after 200 style points)

item.title: HELP
item.content:encoded:
i need to do the jonin ascension S2 i have white eye and reaper blood
what is the other bloodline easy to bring??
